item.title: Weekly Notes – 18/7/15
item.description: This is the first post in a series that I’ll (hopefully) send out every week. It’ll cover the problems I have during the week as well as how I overcome those issues. Hopefully this will be of some use to people out there, leave me a comment if you find any of this useful! Docker machine + docker compose https://raw.githubusercontent.com/docker/machine/master/docs/img/logo.png So I’ve been playing around with docker-machine while working on a pet project of mine: daftpunk.
